name: Solstice (itch) (basmatisoftware, cy crypticcalypte!, sou, YeehawShrimp, Kirukle, CopyCatCopy)
name_original: Solstice (itch) (basmatisoftware, cy crypticcalypte!, sou, YeehawShrimp, Kirukle, CopyCatCopy)
description:
Solstice is a 2.5D puzzle RPG following Juno, a teenager stuck in a seemingly ever-repeating day who must step out of their comfort zone and complete daily, menial tasks in order to break the cycle.

( NOW IN DEVELOPMENT )
